name: Larvy
description:
Play as Larvy, the Cosmic Worm, and eat all the celestial bodies to grow more and more, and eat something bigger after!
You can download an English version or the original Spanish version of the game!

Includes:
· 30 levels, with a (probably unexpected) ending!
· A bunch of different types of enemies with different behaviour that you'll have to avoid!
· A lot of wormholes in each level connecting different points of space that can be of help!
· 5 boss fights!
· 666 lives, because lives were a thing in video games when I first made this game!
There were only 6 lives at first, but that was too difficult!
You can save your progress anyways, so that's why lives are not a thing in video games anymore. :P

Controls:
Enter = Start.
Cursor keys = Movement.
F2 = Save.
F3 = Load.
Esc = Exit.
